data.name: MessageTextHeader
data.value: "The man who cannot believe in himself cannot believe in anything else.” Roy L. Smith

data.name: SubInfoPage_AboutMe
data.value:
Hi my name is Jones Guidini. I've been a technology enthusiast since I was a kid. I was that kind of boy who usually opened the toys to see how they worked from the inside. Time passes but the passion for technology only increases. What always keeps me willing to learn more and more is the curiosity. Due to it, I could meet the amazing web developing world. When I first started reading my first HTML book I even didn't have a computer.

I have a Bachelor's degree in Analysis Systems, an MBA in Software Engineering and more than 12 years of background experience in web development but I still consider myself as an apprentice. Over these 12 years I have been working with a variety of technologies. I started as an Web designer (front-end) and next I after some time I felt the necessity of going further. Hence, I learned some back-end technologies and from that moment on, I started using these technologies for all projects. Over the last five years, I have been working with the great .NET platform (ASP MVC, C#, Entity Framework, SQL and other related ones) in parallel with front-end technologies, which I’ve been always improving and learning new frameworks. In doing so, I am always trying to keep me up to date according to IT market trends.

Today I divide my time between the most important things for me: God, my wife and my job career. As they both get along very well, consequently I am a very happy person, always willing to keep going facing new challenges.

In case you are interested in knowing more about me, visit other sections of this site. And if you are a technology enthusiast like me and you’d like to discuss about new projects and proposals, please feel free to contact me. It will be a pleasure to have a conversation with you.

See you soon.

data.name: SubInfoPage_Contact
data.value: If you want to talk to me you can use any of these alternatives below. Please, choose the most convenient for you. I look forward to receiving your message and I promise I'll answer it as fast as possible.

data.name: SubInfoPage_Home
data.value: As a web developer with over 12 years of valuable experience, I’ve been working hard to improve my knowledge and skills in order to offer the best I can. Over the years, I’ve gained a lot of experience working with different approaches related to web development. I started as a web designer using front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Photoshop, Illustrator and others. Some years later, I began to explore back-end technologies such as PHP, MySQL and others. Finally, I met the giant .NET word (C#, ASP MVC, Entity Framework and so on), which I’ve been working with for the past four years using it in a variety of projects and systems. To summarize, I consider myself as a reliable, open-minded problem-solver, and a competent professional. Hence, taking all of this into account, I am always willing to deliver high-quality service using all my background experience.

data.name: SubInfoPage_Portfolio
data.value: If you are curious about what I’ve done as web developer, you’re in the right place. Here you can check some of my work. You can see that it is organized into categories. Therefore, if you are interested in seeing a specific one, click on the name of the category and it will open a list of work.

data.name: SubInfoPage_Skills
data.value: Throughout these twelve years, I have been learning about technologies largely used in web development. As a Front and Back End developer, I have gathered knowledge in many different technologies. Some of them were discontinued and new ones were added. In order to make it easy to measure my knowledge, I listed some of these technologies below, you can see them by category. Enjoy yourself!
